remarks.para:
-HTML Forms
-{{HTMLElement("input")}} and the interface it's based upon.
-<input type="search">
-textarea: Multi-line text input
-Compatibility of CSS properties

HTMLElementInputText.value: The value attribute is a string that contains the current value of the text entered into the text field. You can retrieve this using the value property in JavaScript.If no validation constraints are in place for the input (see Validation for more details), the value may be an empty string ("").
